title: Move referral_review_status to top of Staff/Admin Referral review screen

requirements.summary: Reorder the Staff/Admin Referral review UI so the existing referral_review_status section is the first section shown in the Referral review dialog content area.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Staff/Admin Referral review UI (referral detail/review view), `referral_review_status` is displayed as the first field/section at the top of the screen/content area before any other referral fields.
No new fields are added anywhere in the Referral review UI.
No new conditional behavior, validation, mutations, queries, or backend calls are introduced as part of this change.
No backend data model, stored values, or API behavior is changed.

file_operations.description: In the Staff/Admin referral details Dialog, move the existing 'Referral Review Status' block (the current referral_review_status section) to be the first rendered section directly under the Dialog container/top of scrollable content, before any other referral fields/sections. Keep all existing UI elements and handlers unchanged; only reorder layout/JSX.
